projectGridLines.title: Project Management & Analytics for Rural Water Purification & IOT based Water Supply Schemes
projectGridLines.description: Project Description Supply, Installation, Comissioning & IoT based Monitoring of 15K EC water purification plants across rural maharashtra to purify 1.5 billion litres of water per day / Per month impacting 3 Cr lives. Key Deliverables 1. Identify bottlenecks and provide insights for execution / deliverables / maintenance milestones of EC project via advanced analytics skills (PowerBI/Python/Tableau/Google Analytics). 2. Root cause analysis for delays via interaction across company functions like purchase, finance and project execution. 3. Screening & Shortlisting & support procurement of IOT Devices and flow, water quality & pressure instrumentation to be deployed for the project 4. Provide Summary reports indicating WoW, MoM, QoQ progress of projects based on different dimenisons & demographics such as District, Villages, EC Size, Team size etc. Skill sets: 1. Data Analytics using Power BI / Google BI / Tableau or equivalent. 2. IoT Analytics 3. Knowledge of handling Process Instrumentations 4. Communication & Presentation Skills 5. Project Management Expected learning: 1. Project Analytics for large scale project 2. Project management for large scale projects 3. Large scale IOT deployment & Analytics 4. Large scale Instrumentation Selection & Deployment Specific courses required for project execution: Process Instrumentation, IOT, BI Tools like Power BI/Tableau/Google BI/R/Python

projectGridLines.title: Rural Digital Transformation Analytics
projectGridLines.description: Project Description: Establishing Pilot 'Amrit Gram' (IoT & 5g enabled Smart Villages) Models and evaluating impact of 25+ Digital and technology interventions for further studies and scale up across India & RoW Markets in partnership with Governments, NGOs, CSR & ESG Funds. For more details refer to this Youtube video: https://youtu.be/7aA31HmLeSg Key Deliverables: 1. Deeply understand and flowchart village level IoT and Agritech based technologies via site visits, online/offline surveys and group interactions. 2. Evaluate Data flowing from various technological interventions installed at Village level in terms of accuracy, frequency & data integrity. 3. Deploy suitable dashboards for summary view of gathered data 4. Derive meaningful insights from gathered data and present to the management on a weekly basis 5. Technical support in implementation of various interventions under the project. Skill sets: 1. Data Analytics using Power BI / Google BI / Tableau or equivalent. 2. IoT Analytics 3. Knowledge of handling Process Instrumentations 4. Communication & Presentation Skills 5. Project Management Expected learning: 1. Project Analytics for large scale project 2. Project management for large scale projects 3. Large scale IOT deployment & Analytics 4. Large scale Instrumentation Selection & Deployment Specific courses required for project execution: Process Instrumentation, IOT, BI Tools like Power BI/Tableau/Google BI/R/Python
